description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: Traffic on Sai Kung Man Yee Road leading to High Island Reservoir East Dam
description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 通往萬宜水庫東壩的西貢萬宜路交通現時非常繁忙

2025-10-01T10:15:00.CONTENT_EN: The Transport Department announced that the traffic on Sai Kung Man Yee Road leading to High Island Reservoir East Dam is very busy at the moment. The operator of Green Minibus Route No. 9A has strengthened its service to cater for passenger demand. Visitors are advised to plan ahead their journeys, reserve sufficient commuting time, and be patient while queuing.
2025-10-01T10:15:00.CONTENT_CN: 運輸署表示，通往萬宜水庫東壩的西貢萬宜路交通現時非常繁忙，專線小巴第9A號線的營辦商已加強服務應對乘客需求。請遊人妥善計劃行程，預留充裕交通時間，同時在輪候時保持忍讓。

2025-10-03T10:50:00.CONTENT_EN: The Transport Department announced that the traffic on Sai Kung Man Yee Road leading to High Island Reservoir East Dam is very busy at the moment. The operator of Green Minibus Route No. 9A has strengthened its service to cater for passenger demand. Visitors are advised to plan ahead their journeys, reserve sufficient commuting time, and be patient while queuing.

description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: Ferry Service Adjustments and Special Bus Service Arrangements
description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 渡輪服務調整及特別巴士服務安排

2025-10-02T15:45:00.CONTENT_EN:
On 3 October (Friday) 2025, the licensed ferry services will be adjusted. For relevant details and special bus service arrangements, please refer to relevant Transport Department Notice (https://www. td. gov. hk/filemanager/en/content_13/TPFR/Special%20Event%20TDN%20EN%20final. pdf)

The ferry operators will advise passengers of temporary service adjustments through their websites and/or mobile applications, as well as by displaying notices at relevant piers and inside the vessels.
2025-10-02T15:45:00.CONTENT_CN:
在2025年10月3日（星期五），持牌渡輪服務將作出調整。相關詳情及特別巴士服務安排，請參閱有關運輸署公告 
(https://www.td.gov.hk/filemanager/tc/content_13/TPFR/Special%20Event%20TDN%20CN%20final.pdf)

渡輪營辦商會透過網頁及/或手機應用程式，並於相關碼頭及船上張貼通告，通知乘客上述安排。

description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: Adjustments of Ferry/ Kaito Ferry Services on 4 October 2025

2025-10-04T10:39:00.CONTENT_EN:
Due to tropical cyclone, the following ferry/ kaito ferry services will be adjusted:

Tsui Wah Ferry Service (H. K. ) Limited
- Tung Ping Chau to Ma Liu Shui: Last sailing at 2:00 PM
- Sai Kung to Kau Sai Village & High Island: Last sailing at 11:30 AM
- High Island & Kau Sai Village to Sai Kung: Last sailing at 12:30 PM
- Ma Liu Shui to Tap Mun: Last sailing at 12:30 PM
- Tap Mun to Ma Liu Shui: Last sailing at 1:45 PM
- Wong Shek to Tap Mun: Last sailing at 3:30 PM
- Tap Mun to Wong Shek: Last sailing at 3:05 PM
- Aberdeen/ Stanley to Po Toi Island: Service suspended
- Po Toi Island to Aberdeen/ Stanley: Last sailing at 2:00 PM.
2025-10-04T10:39:00.CONTENT_CN:
受熱帶氣旋影響，以下渡輪/街渡服務將會作出調整：

翠華船務（香港）有限公司
-東平洲至馬料水：尾班船於下午2時正開出
-西貢至滘西村及糧船灣：尾班船於上午11時30分開出
-糧船灣及滘西村至西貢：尾班船於下午12時30分開出
-馬料水至塔門：尾班船於下午12時30分開出
-塔門至馬料水：尾班船於下午1時45分開出
-黃石至塔門：尾班船於下午3時30分開出
-塔門至黃石：尾班船於下午3時05分開出
-香港仔/赤柱至蒲台島：暫停服務
-蒲台島至香港仔/赤柱：尾班船於下午2時正開出。

2025-10-04T12:49:00.CONTENT_EN:

- Tap Mun to Wong Shek: Last sailing at 3:05 PM

Fortune Ferry Company Limited

Peng Chau Kai To Limited

Yun Lee Marine Holdings Limited ‘Tseung Kwan O (South) – Sai Wan Ho’ Route: - Tseung Kwan O (South) to Sai Wan Ho: Service suspended - Sai Wan Ho to Tseung Kwan O (South): Service suspended Sun Ferry Services Limited ‘Peng Chau - Mui Wo - Chi Ma Wan - Cheung Chau’ Route: - sailings from 6.35 am onwards would omit Chi Ma Wan
2025-10-05T07:50:00.CONTENT_CN: 受熱帶氣旋影響，以下渡輪/街渡服務已經作出調整： 翠華船務（香港）有限公司 「馬料水-東平洲」航線： -東平洲至馬料水：暫停服務 「西貢-滘西村-糧船灣」航線： -西貢至滘西村及糧船灣：暫停服務 -糧船灣及滘西村至西貢：暫停服務 「馬料水-塔門」航線： -馬料水至塔門：暫停服務 -塔門至馬料水：暫停服務 「黃石-塔門」航線： -黃石至塔門：暫停服務 -塔門至黃石：暫停服務 「香港仔/赤柱-蒲台島」航線： -香港仔/赤柱至蒲台島：暫停服務 -蒲台島至香港仔/赤柱：暫停服務 富裕小輪有限公司 「屯門-東涌-沙螺灣-大澳」航線： -屯門至大澳：暫停服務 -東涌至大澳：暫停服務 -大澳至屯門(經沙螺灣及東涌)：暫停服務 -大澳至屯門(只經東涌)：暫停服務 坪洲街渡有限公司 「愉景灣-梅窩」航線： -愉景灣至梅窩：暫停服務 -梅窩至愉景灣：暫停服務 珊瑚海船務有限公司 「西灣河-三家村」航線： -所有航班不停靠鯉魚門。 潤利海事控股有限公司 「將軍澳（南）-西灣河」航線： -將軍澳（南）至西灣河：暫停服務 -西灣河至將軍澳（南）：暫停服務 新渡輪服務有限公司 「坪洲—梅窩—芝麻灣—長洲」航線： -早上6時35分起的航班將暫停途經芝麻灣直至另行通知

2025-10-04T12:20:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to hoisting of Strong Wind Signal No. 3 and the associated wet weather, Transport Department appeals motorists and the commuters to: i. pay attention to the special traffic and transport arrangements may be implemented; ii. pay attention to the possible traffic congestions of the roads; iii. plan the journey in advance; iv. allow more traveling time to cater for delay; v. drive with extra care and patience; and vi. take heed of traffic situation particularly at busy junctions with obstructive views.
2025-10-04T12:20:00.CONTENT_CN: 由於三號強風信號現正生效、天雨路滑，運輸署呼籲駕駛人士及乘客須: i.留意當局可能會實施特別的交通及運輸措施； ii.留意在個別道路可能會出現交通擠塞的情況； iii.提早計劃行程路線； iv.預留充裕時間出門； v.小心駕駛及保持忍讓；及 vi.特别留意視線受阻的交通繁忙路口。
